## 

```{r}
library(mlbench)
library(ggplot2)
data(BostonHousing2)
```

1.  Making a box plot

```{r}
ggplot(BostonHousing2, aes(x = b, y = chas, color = chas))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  labs(x = "b")
```

2.  make a scatter plot or a line plot

```{r}
ggplot(BostonHousing2, aes(x = medv, y = crim))+
  geom_line(color = "purple")+
  labs(title = "Per Capita Crime Rates by median Value of owener-occupied homes", x = "Median value of owner-occupied homes in USD 1000's", y= "Per capita crime rate by town")
```
